metadata.synopsis: Kobold Looter has been left to loot and the player has stayed in the area for long enough to see them finish up
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Dig up the coffin- Open it and either:  - Be invisible  - Be a cat/raven  - Pay money to leave in peace- Leave Bugthimble alone for 1 minute without leaving the area

0.speaker: Bugthimble
0.text: All right, that's every last shiny. Time to get gone!
